evidence.claim: Jex utilizes AWS services for serverless computing and storage solutions.
The company implements FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Jex supports various EDI transaction sets including X12 for healthcare billing.
Integration of HL7 standards in healthcare communication is part of Jex's platform.

icp.icp_reason: Jex employs X12 EDI and focuses on API-based healthcare integrations.
